meanings.definition: To impart knowledge or skill to someone by instruction or example.
meanings.sent1: I will teach you how to read.
meanings.sent3: The wise owl decided to teach the young birds how to fly.
meanings.sent4: Experience will teach you more than any book can.
meanings.sent5: Let me teach you the secret to making the perfect pancake.

meanings.definition: To cause someone to learn or understand something by example or experience.
meanings.sent1: Watching her older sister bake cookies taught her how to do it.
meanings.sent2: Parents teach their children important life lessons.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy taught the cat how to play fetch.
meanings.sent4: The storm taught us the importance of being prepared.
meanings.sent5: The stars in the night sky can teach us about the vastness of the universe.
